title: King Legacy Script 2024: Auto Farm Level, Auto Stats & More
text:
Introducing the first in 2024 on roblox King Legacy script which has a graphical interface as well as many features that will make you much stronger such as Auto Farm Level, Auto Sea King, Auto Ghost Ship, Auto Hydra, Auto Buso and others. This script is new, which means that it will definitely work for some time to come. But the old scripts on our site, which we published earlier, may not work, as the game has been frequently updated since then. The script is free, you can download it from cheater.fun, luckily it doesn't even require an activation key, which means it will be much easier to run, you can find instructions on how to do this below.
(working)
by Black Trap Team
